contents: Article 22 (Assignment of Referees) ① Member sports organizations must assign referees for all competitions based on the decision of the referee committee of the relevant organization, and make the list of referees assigned to the public available to game participants through the bulletin board, etc. Revised February 10, 2023. ② When assigning referees, they must not be assigned to the same player (team) in consecutive games. ③ Except in cases specifically determined by the judging committee of the member sport organization, priority is given in the following order. Revised 2016. 4. 28., 2018. 4. 25. 1. Permanent referees approved by the Sports Council Newly established 2018. 4. 25. 2. Referees who have completed the advanced referee training (referee academy) course hosted by the Sports Council Newly established 2018. 4 25. 3. Referees who have completed the referee training training (referee academy) course hosted by the Sports Council. Established on April 25, 2018.
